import React from 'react'; import './modal.scss' import {FontAwesomeIcon} from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import {faCircleXmark} from "@fortawesome/free-regular-svg-icons"; const Modal = ({open, onClose, onLoggedIn}) => { if(!open) return null return( // div to add translucent background behind login popup
{/*div for the background to the form*/}
{/*button to close popup*/} {/*form for logging in*/}





{/*buttons to add options of what to do */}
) } export default Modal
